prompts: Create a cute Pokemon that looks like a small pink bulldog with big green ears.
Design a fairy-type Pokemon with a round body and a grumpy expression.
Imagine a bipedal creature with a pink body and a blue bowtie, perfect for friendly battles.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a plush toy but has a fierce personality.
Generate a Pokemon with a mix of fluffy features and a tough exterior, maybe a little mischievous.
Make a small Pokemon that has a rounded shape and a lot of character, like a fluffy companion.
Give me a playful Pokemon that combines features of a dog and a fairy with bright colors.
